title: Sample Space
text: There are $$8$$ total areas where the arrow can land on.
speech: There are  8  total areas where the arrow can land on.
pacedSpeech: total areas where the arrow can land on.

title: Vowel Slice
text: There are $$4$$ slices in the circle that the arrow can land on: the A, I, E, O.
speech: There are  4  slices in the circle that the arrow can land on: the A, I, E, O.
pacedSpeech: slices in the circle that the arrow can land on: the A, I, E, O.

title: Divide
text: Divide the number of ways the arrow can land on a vowel by the total number of slices the arrow can land on.
speech: Divide the number of ways the arrow can land on a vowel by the total number of slices the arrow can land on.
pacedSpeech: Divide the number of ways the arrow can land on a vowel by the total number of slices the arrow can land on.
